MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutoSortCustomSubtotal As Integer
public: property int AutoSortCustomSubtotal { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回对应于用于排序指定的自定义分类汇总的整数自动字段。

span.span: Returns an integer corresponding to the custom subtotal used to sort the specified field automatically.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 默认值是 1 （自动）。

span.span: The default value is 1 (Automatic).

para.span: 当AutoSortCustomSubtotal属性设置为 1 （自动） 时，数据进行排序的正则分类汇总。

span.span: When the AutoSortCustomSubtotal property is set to 1 (Automatic), the data is sorted by the regular subtotals.

para.span: AutoSortCustomSubtotal属性可以具有下表中列出的索引值之一。

span.span: The AutoSortCustomSubtotal property can have one of the index values listed in the following table.
Automatic
Sum
Count
Average
Max
Min
Product
Count Nums
StdDev
StdDevp
Var
Varp

para.span: 只有实际显示在数据透视表中的自定义分类汇总才支持排序，因此如果尝试将 AutoSortCustomSubtotal 设置为某个值，该值代表一个不在数据透视表视图中的自定义分类汇总，则会返回一个运行时错误。

span.span: Sorting is supported only by custom subtotals that are actually displayed in the PivotTable, so trying to set AutoSortCustomSubtotal to a value representing a custom subtotal not in the PivotTable view will return a run-time error.

para.span: 如果基于自定义分类汇总应用排序，且从数据透视表中删除该分类汇总，则 AutoSortCustomSubtotal 属性将自动设置为默认值 (1)。

span.span: If sorting is applied based on a custom subtotal, and that subtotal is removed from the PivotTable, the AutoSortCustomSubtotal property will automatically be set to the default value (1).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DatabaseSort { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置为True时，手动更改数据透视表字段中的项目的位置被允许。

summary.span: 可读写 Boolean。

para.span: 如果数据源不是联机分析处理 (OLAP) 数据源，则 DatabaseSort 属性返回 False。

span.span: The DatabaseSort property returns False if the data source is not an Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) data source.

If the cell contains a formula, the Formula property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或者公式设置为日期类型，则 Microsoft Excel 将检查此单元格的数字格式是否符合日期或者时间格式。如果不符合，Microsoft Excel 将把数字格式设置为默认的短日期格式。

span.span: Setting the formula for a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

span.span: For OLAP data sources, setting this property for one field in a hierarchy sets the orientation for the other fields in the same hierarchy. Dimension fields can only be oriented in the row, column, and page field areas of the PivotTable report. Measure fields can only be oriented in the data area. Setting a hierarchy or data field to xlHidden removes the hierarchy or field from the PivotTable report.
